kastvA# yunaktiq sa tvA# yunaktuq viShNu#stvA yunaktvaqsya yaqj~jasyad^^rdhyaiq mahyaq(gm)q sanna#tyA aqmuShmaiq kAmAqyA&&*yu#ShE tvA prAqNAya# tvA &pAqnAya# tvA vyAqnAya# tvAq vyu#ShTyai tvA raqyyai tvAq rAdha#sE tvAq GOShA#ya tvAq pOShA#ya tvA &&rAdGOqShAya# tvAq pracyu#tyai tvA || 37
(kastvAq - &ShTAtri(gm)#Sat) (A13)
